description:
The law firm of Colling, Gilbert, Wright and Carter serves clients in Orlando, Florida, and the surrounding communities in many areas of law, including personal injury, securities litigation and veterans' benefits.

Our lawyers focus on a limited number of claims so that they can give each client the attention and consideration they deserve. We want to see your lawsuit come to a successful ending, so it is in our best interests to be in regular contact with you and to keep you informed every step of the way. All of our cases are handled by a team consisting of one or two lawyers, their support staff and experts in the fields relating to a particular case. For instance, in a personal injury suit, we would retain the services of medical experts who understand a client's case.

All of our partners have received an AV Preeminent* rating from the Martindale-Hubbell peer review system and our law firm is listed in the Bar Register of Preeminent Lawyers. Our law firm has an excellent reputation within our community and has been retained to act as co-counsel on large cases in other states.

At Colling, Gilbert, Wright & Carter we value the client as a person more than as a case. Our law firm prides itself on the relationship we have with our clients as well as the success rate we have whether settling cases or going to trial.

* AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
